lead_paragraph: Lonnie Lechelt’s solo home run sparked a three-run second inning and put Oregon State, the defending national champion, ahead to stay in a 7-3 victory against Virginia in the Charlottesville regional.
snippet: Lonnie Lechelt’s solo home run sparked a three-run second inning and put Oregon State, the defending national champion, ahead to stay in a 7-3 victory against Virginia in the Charlottesville regional.
